entry.title: ITEM NUMBER 022865 JUMBO POP IT 12 PIECES PER DISPLAY
entry.summary:
Vendor: NOVELTY INC
Type: NOVELTIES
Price: 143.93

OVER 225 BUBBLES TO POP on one JUMBO POP!!!!!

JUMBO Fidget Fun Pop is a push pop bubble sensory fidget toy for ages 3+. You just can't stop the pop! Relieves stress. Safety tested. 100% silicone. Available in a variety of up-to-12" styles.

Display mix includes:

2ea Rainbow squares

1ea Pastel squares

1ea Tye dye squares

1ea Rainbow heart

1ea Pastel heart

1ea Pastel rainbow butterfly

1ea Rainbow butterfly

1ea Rainbow Unicorn

1ea Pastel rainbow unicorn

1ea Rainbow dinosaur

1ea Tye Dye dinosaur

Fidget Fun Pop Coin Purse is a handy little pouch and push pop bubble sensory fidget toy in one. You just can't stop the pop! Relieves stress. Holds your earbuds, money and more. Safety tested. Each 100% silicone coin purse has a pop panel on the front, key ring, backpack clip and silicone wrist strap. 12 pieces in a color display box. 6 assorted colors.

entry.summary:
Vendor: NOVELTY INC
Type: NOVELTIES
Price: 57.60

EXCLUSIVE ITEM! Fidget Fun Pop Lanyard with ID holder is a standard 30" lanyard with 2 silicone push pop bubble sensory fidget strips! You just can't stop the pop! Relieves stress. Safety tested. Each pop strip is 100% silicone. Clear ID holder is 4.75" x 2.875". It's perfect for school and work ID's. 12 lanyards in a color display box. Each lanyard is packaged in a printed bag. Assorted tie dye and camo styles.

Available August 2021.
